summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 13098, entitled "An Ordinance to regulating plumbing and steam fitting in the City of Seattle, providing for testing and inspecting the same and for fees to be charged for such inspection; providing penalties for violations of the provisions of this ordinance, and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict herewith," approved December 16, 1905, and Ordinance No. 13992, which became a law July 10, 1906, amendatory thereof.
